text: The Tailor from Torzhok () is a 1925 Soviet silent comedy movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.В Доме кино открылась выставка Музея кино «Владимир Егоров: сто лет в кино»Закройщик из Торжка It stars Igor Ilyinsky, Olga Zhizneva, and Anatoli Ktorov. ==Actors== * Igor Ilyinsky - Petya Petelkin * Olga Zhizneva - Young Lady * Anatoly Ktorov - Young Man * Vera Maretskaya - Katya * Lidiya Deykun - Widow Shirinkina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1925 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: The Tailor from Torzhok
